trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>.
Its content property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and its header property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 해당 콘텐츠 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> 헤더 속성은 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.
Customizing the TabControl Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 동일한 속성 설정을 적용 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> 컨트롤을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 관련 된 상태를 보려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, 참조 [TabControl 스타일 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 경우 해당 속성을 둘 다에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> 컨트롤의 기본 템플릿에 하 고 사용 하 여 설정 됩니다는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> elements.
trans-unit.target: 만드는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> 와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />이 선택되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />이 선택되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`

<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected%2A> property to select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected%2A> 선택할 속성을 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> 프로그래밍 방식으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs" />.
Responds when an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> is called.
Old value of the content property.
New value of the content property.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property changes.
Old value of the content template property.
New value of the content template property.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate" /> property changes.
Old value of the content template selector.
New value of the content template selector.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property changes.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 자동화 인프라의 일부로 이 컨트롤에 대한 적절한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" /> 구현을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
Keyboard input event arguments.
Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소에 키보드 포커스가 설정되어 있음을 알립니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected" /> event.
Called to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> property has changed to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />로 변경되었음을 나타내기 위해 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected" /> event.
Called to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> property has changed to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> 속성이 <see langword="false" />로 변경되었음을 나타내기 위해 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tab strip placement.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Dock" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Dock.Top" />.
This property cannot be set.
It gets its value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.TabStripPlacement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to retrieve <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement%2A> information about a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 검색 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다. <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement%2A> 에 대 한 정보는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement" /> dependency property.
